price: Na anaye tenda chembe ya uovu atauona!
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
footnotes: Na mwenye kufanya shari ya uzito wa chembe ya mchanga ataiona kadhaalika, na atapata malipo yake. Wala Mola wako Mlezi hatamdhulumu yeyote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
